metadata.title: CVE-2022-38860 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Certain The MPlayer Project products are vulnerable to Divide By Zero viafunction demux_open_avi() of libmpdemux/demux_avi.c which affects mencoder.This affects mplayer SVN-r38374-13.0.1 and mencoder SVN-r38374-13.0.1.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-38860` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mencoder - 2:1.3.0-8+deb10u1build0.20.04.1
mplayer - 2:1.3.0-8+deb10u1build0.20.04.1
mplayer-gui - 2:1.3.0-8+deb10u1build0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mplayer package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.3.0-8+deb10u1build0.20.04.1').
